faq.q: Does it work on NanoBanana images?
faq.a: Yes! NanoBanana uses the same underlying technology as Gemini for image generation. Our algorithm perfectly detects and removes the characteristic translucent strip found on both.

faq.q: How does it remove the watermark without blurring?
faq.a: Unlike standard 'healing' tools that blur the area, our AI calculates the exact pixel values hidden behind the semi-transparent watermark layer, mathematically restoring the original image.

faq.q: Will my photos be uploaded to a server?
faq.a: No. All processing happens 100% locally in your browser using WebAssembly. Your images never leave your device, ensuring complete privacy.

We primarily focus on removing visible artifacts (the strip) to restore visual aesthetics. While the re-encoding process may disrupt digital signatures like SynthID, we do not guarantee complete removal of invisible cryptographic watermarks.

faq.q: Is there a limit on how many images I can process?
faq.a: No limits. Since it runs on your own device, you can process as many images as your computer's memory handles.
